document_data.name: City of Mages
document_data.author: [[Savengriff]]
document_data.mainbody:
'''''City of Mages''''' was a [[book]] written by [[Savengriff]], husband to [[Aleena Paladinstar]] of [[Waterdeep]], published in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|Step back, secure your goods and children, then sell tickets or place bets. Your choice.|An excerpt from ''City of Mages'' on what folk could do about [[spell]] battles.}}
document_data.History: Aleena Paladinstar and Savengriff were prolific writers. One of the books from under their [[quill]]s was ''City of Mages'', published in the {{YearlinkName|1381}}. In the {{YearlinkName|1479}}, [[Renaer Neverember]] owned the couple's entire body of mundane works, which included Savengriff's ''City of Mages''.
